title: Archive Old Campaigns
description: To clean up the ad account, a manager needs to archive all campaigns that ended more than a year ago.

tasks.description: Filter the list of all campaigns to show only those with an end date more than 365 days in the past.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of old, completed campaigns.

tasks.description: Select all the campaigns in the filtered list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent highlights all the correct campaigns.

tasks.description: Change the status of the selected campaigns to 'Archived'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully archives the old campaigns, hiding them from the default view.
